text: Paula Cole (born April 5, 1968) is an American singer and songwriter. Her songs include Where Have all the Cowboys Gone?. Cole was born in the Boston area. She received a Grammy Award for "Best New Artist" in 1998 and released more albums over the years. ==References== Category:American singer- songwriters Category:American rock singers Category:American Grammy Award winners Category:American pianists Category:American keyboardists Category:Singers from Massachusetts Category:Musicians from Massachusetts Category:1968 births Category:Living people
title: Paula Cole
